title: Introducing: Dræn
content:
Nebraska drone artist Dræn creates some of the most surreal, vivid musical soundscapes about, combining ambient influences with minimal, dubstep inspired beats. With a handful of tracks available so far, over three releases, Dræn focuses on the usage of layered sounds to mastermind truly stimulating compositions. Waterfront is a rather sultry, brooding piece, bubbling darkly beneath the surface for the majority of the track, before culminating in a flurry of reverb and static.

From September’s release Earth, Sea, Sun, opening track Earth is a more jovially optimistic experience, awash with angelic string sections and transcendental vocal-like synths. Dræn is unlikely to ever make a dint in the mainstream, however his/her music has a certain admirable aspirational quality to it, and is undoubtedly worthy of a listen, plus the artworks are simply stunning. Check out Earth and Waterfront below, and head over to Dræn’s bandcamp for more music.
